thread.title: Continuing been my fav hotel in Paris
thread.title_full: Continuing been my fav hotel in Paris - Review of Hotel De Nell, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Charlyncy12
title: Continuing been my fav hotel in Paris
text:
This time is a mix of business and personal visit to Paris. I was welcomed as an old friend by everyone and the little attentions are always a nice surprise (champagne in the room, personalised welcome letter)! The room is as always so comfortable, clean, giving you the feel to be at home. The view on the church is appeasing and inspiring. The breakfast is beyond generous!
And did I say it? The team here is such a treat: professional always, discrete and always present. Service is fast ! Quality : premium!
